channel.title: Mod cape
channel.description: Ok so I took a screenshot of the Quest Cape. I added an admin crown on it instead of the quest logo. I put a pic of it on Photobucket. Can someone please tell me how I can make the Quest cape be called Mod Cape and make it this pic. Thanks. [img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/modcape_zpsbb85a414.png.html[/img] http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/modcape_zpsbb85a414.png.html

item.title: Mod cape
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

No problem and please go learn basic java as i said it will be alot easier for you to understand this learn
if
else
boolean
int
String
methods (voids)

Read full topic

item.title: Mod cape
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:4, topic:517185”]What so hard to understand?? [size=36pt]CLASS8[/size]
then add :
if(i == [size=36pt]yourItemID[/size]){
class8.aString170 = “New name”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A new examine”.getBytes();
}[/quote]

…thanks i guess…
